content.json:
# 🏗️ Azuria - Dashboard de Infrastructure

Monitoramento de recursos Azure, custos, e performance de infraestrutura.

---

content.query:
requests
| where timestamp >= ago(1h)
| where url contains "azurestaticapps.net"
| summarize 
    request_count = count(),
    avg_duration = avg(duration),
    success_rate = avg(case(success == true, 100.0, 0.0)),
    unique_users = dcount(user_Id)
    by bin(timestamp, 5m)
| render timechart with (title="Static Web App - Performance Metrics")
content.title: SWA Performance

content.query:
// Resource Usage Tracking
customMetrics
| where timestamp >= ago(24h)
| where name in ("requests_count", "data_transfer_mb", "storage_usage_mb")
| summarize 
    total_requests = sumif(value, name == "requests_count"),
    data_transfer_gb = sumif(value, name == "data_transfer_mb") / 1024,
    storage_usage_gb = sumif(value, name == "storage_usage_mb") / 1024
    by bin(timestamp, 1h)
| extend 
    estimated_cost_usd = (total_requests * 0.0001) + (data_transfer_gb * 0.087) + (storage_usage_gb * 0.0208)
| project timestamp, total_requests, data_transfer_gb, storage_usage_gb, estimated_cost_usd
| render timechart with (title="Usage Metrics & Estimated Costs")
content.title: Cost Tracking

content.query:
dependencies
| where timestamp >= ago(1h)
| where type == "Http"
| summarize 
    dependency_count = count(),
    avg_duration = avg(duration),
    success_rate = avg(case(success == true, 100.0, 0.0))
    by target, bin(timestamp, 5m)
| render timechart with (title="External Dependencies Performance")
content.title: Network Dependencies

content.query:
dependencies
| where timestamp >= ago(1h)
| where target contains "supabase"
| summarize 
    query_count = count(),
    avg_duration = avg(duration),
    p95_duration = percentile(duration, 95),
    success_rate = avg(case(success == true, 100.0, 0.0))
    by bin(timestamp, 5m)
| render timechart with (title="Supabase Database Performance")
content.title: Database Performance

content.query:
// Infrastructure Health Score
let app_availability = requests
| where timestamp >= ago(1h)
| summarize availability = (countif(success == true) * 100.0) / count();
let database_availability = dependencies
| where timestamp >= ago(1h) and target contains "supabase"
| summarize db_availability = (countif(success == true) * 100.0) / count();
let cdn_performance = dependencies
| where timestamp >= ago(1h) and type == "Http"
| summarize cdn_avg_response = avg(duration);
union 
    (app_availability | extend component = "Static Web App", metric = "Availability %", value = availability, status = case(availability > 99.9, "🟢 Excellent", availability > 99, "🟡 Good", "🔴 Poor")),
    (database_availability | extend component = "Supabase DB", metric = "Availability %", value = db_availability, status = case(db_availability > 99.5, "🟢 Excellent", db_availability > 95, "🟡 Good", "🔴 Poor")),
    (cdn_performance | extend component = "CDN/Network", metric = "Avg Response (ms)", value = cdn_avg_response, status = case(cdn_avg_response < 500, "🟢 Fast", cdn_avg_response < 1500, "🟡 Acceptable", "🔴 Slow"))
| project component, metric, value, status
| where isnotnull(value)
content.title: Infrastructure Health Status

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp >= ago(7d)
| where name == "deployment_completed"
| summarize deployment_count = count() by bin(timestamp, 1d)
| render columnchart with (title="Deployments per Day - Last 7 Days")
content.title: Deployment Frequency
